sqlMap.insert: insert into guestbook (id, writer, blogId, contents, dateCreated) values(#id#,#writer#,#blog.id#, #contents#, #dateCreated#)
sqlMap.select: select id from guestbook where blogId = #blogId# order by id desc limit 1
SELECT g.id as id, g.writer as writer, g.contents as contents, g.dateCreated as dateCreated FROM guestbook g where g.blogId = #blogId# order by g.id desc
SELECT g.id as id, g.writer as writer, g.contents as contents, g.dateCreated as dateCreated FROM guestbook g join blogs b on b.id = g.blogId where g.blogId = #blogId# and g.id = #id#
sqlMap.update: update guestbook set contents = #contents# where id = #id# and blogId = #blog.id#
sqlMap.delete: delete from guestbook where id = #id# and blogId = #blog.id#
